alert.note: Alert for Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 12:50PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Big Horn, southwestern Powder River and southern Rosebud Counties through 130 PM MDT... At 1248 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 30 miles southeast of Busby, or 30 miles northeast of Sheridan, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rain, winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Stay alert for water on the roads. Locations impacted include... Birney and Birney Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
